# Pull Request

## Description

Brief description of the changes introduced by this PR.

## Type of Change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Security improvement

## Testing

Describe the tests that you ran to verify your changes. Provide instructions so we can reproduce.

- [ ] Unit tests pass
- [ ] Integration tests pass
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Security scans pass (Bandit, Semgrep, Pylint)

## Security Checklist

- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] Input validation implemented where needed
- [ ] No SQL injection vulnerabilities
- [ ] No unsafe deserialization
- [ ] Security tests added/updated

## Documentation

- [ ] Code is self-documenting with clear variable names and structure
- [ ] Docstrings added/updated for public APIs
- [ ] README updated (if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated
- [ ] No breaking changes to public APIs (or documented if necessary)

## Review Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Code is DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself)
- [ ] Complex logic is commented
- [ ] Error handling is appropriate
- [ ] Performance impact considered
